title: Team Confirms No Concussion for Primož Roglič After Nasty Crash at Itzulia Basque Country
content:
Update: Bora-Hansgrohe rule out a concussion, and confirm 'superficial wounds on his right side, contusions and bruising.'

Read the full article at Team Confirms No Concussion for Primož Roglič After Nasty Crash at Itzulia Basque Country on Velo.
author: ahood
